snippet: The third annual marathon run in Gaza, set for April 10, was canceled after its Islamic leaders barred women from participating, the organizer said.
lead_paragraph: The third annual marathon run in Gaza, set for April 10, was canceled after its Islamic leaders barred women from participating, the organizer said.

headline.seo: Marathon in Gaza Canceled Over a Ban on Women
headline.main: Gaza: Marathon Canceled Over a Ban on Women
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Marathon Canceled Over a Ban on Women
